column2: "Welcome back! Have you come up with some great ideas for chocolate toppings?"
"Let's see... Oh, this is fruit! I see, putting this on chocolate makes it look really attractive!"
"And yet, this gorgeous exterior doesn't distract from the chocolate, allowing it to take the leading role!"
"I knew I could count on you to come up with a great idea! I'll pass this on to everyone else right away!"
